docs.title: Synopsis
docs.text:
A versatile command line tool for development

wn [flags]

docs.title: Options
docs.text:
-d, --debug               Debug mode
  -i, --disable-gitignore   Disable .gitignore rules
  -x, --excludes strings    Glob patterns to exclude
  -e, --exts strings        File extensions to include (default [*])
  -g, --git-url string      Git repository URL to clone and pack
  -h, --help                help for wn
  -o, --output string       Output file name
  -p, --workPath string     Work directory path

docs.title: SEE ALSO
docs.text:
• wn agent - Agent management
  • wn ai - Chat with AI
  • wn config - Set config
  • wn doc - Generate documentation
  • wn git - git command
  • wn pack - Pack files
  • wn static - Static files
  • wn version - Print version information

docs.title: Options
docs.text:
--content string   Agent content
      --create string    Create or update an agent
      --delete string    Delete an agent
      --file string      Read content from file
  -h, --help             help for agent
      --list             List all agents
      --show string      Show agent content

docs.title: Synopsis
docs.text:
Start an interactive chat session with AI using configured LLM provider

wn ai [flags]

docs.title: Options
docs.text:
-a, --agent string      AI use agent name
  -h, --help              help for ai
  -t, --max-tokens int    Maximum tokens for response
  -m, --model string      LLM model to use
      --models            List available models for current provider
  -c, --provider string   LLM model Provider
      --providers         List available LLM providers

docs.title: Options
docs.text:
--claude_apikey string      Set Claude API Key
      --claude_model string       Set Claude default model
      --deepseek_apikey string    Set DeepSeek API Key
      --deepseek_model string     Set DeepSeek default model
      --default_agent string      Set default agent
      --default_provider string   Set default LLM provider
  -h, --help                      help for config
      --lang string               Set language (default "en")
      --list                      List all configurations
      --openai_apikey string      Set Openai API Key
      --openai_model string       Set Openai default model

docs.title: Synopsis
docs.text:
Generate documentation for all commands. The documentation will be generated in Markdown format and saved in the docs directory.

wn doc [flags]

docs.title: SEE ALSO
docs.text:
• wn - Wn command line tool
  • wn git commit - Append changes to previous commit
  • wn git list - List commits between two commits
  • wn git rebase - Rebase current branch to target commit
